title: Population Studies | Mabuwaya Foundation
heroText: Tracking and conserving the Philippine crocodile and its habitats
description: The Mabuwaya Foundation conducts research to monitor the population of the critically endangered Philippine crocodile (Crocodylus mindorensis) and other key wildlife in Isabela. Data collected helps guide conservation strategies and community awareness programs.

stats.text: Crocodiles released back into the wild since 2005
Community members trained in wildlife monitoring
